content: *add a little sparkle to your festive ensembles with this stunning shawl crocheted with a shell using an oversized hook this triangle shawl can be finished in a day lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 1319 corrections applied feb 27 2003 skill level easy size one size 60 inches across top edge 33 inches deep from top edge to point glitterspun® article #990 *discontinued* 460 yards crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm gauge 8 row = 5 in pattern stitch shawl begins at the middle of the top edge work 1 row single_crochet evenly spaced around entire shawl to finish *pattern is available as pdf download only *
